name: Ár nDraíocht Féin Update Prototype - adf.org
description:
Please view this prototype in Chrome using the Chrome Stylish addon. This will allow you to view any page in adf.org using the prototype.
  • Left pane navigation improvements on mouse, touchscreen, and screen reader accessibility
  • Modernized display of links and other page elements, such as author bio information
  • Fix for font sizing in small devices (needs changes to existing files to complete this)
  • Improved display of search, login, and logged-in areas
  • Fix for "stretched-out" appearance in large resolutions and wide screens
additional_info:
To view these changes using a simulation of a smaller or larger screen:
  1. While on any adf.org page, open the Chrome Developer Tools (Ctrl+Shift+I).
  2. In the upper left corner of the Developer Tools, click on the tiny picture of a cell phone to toggle Device Mode.
  3. Choose a device from the dropdown at the top of the page.
  4. Note: The touchscreen simulation shows a round fuzzy dot for your cursor and "taps" on things other than what you are trying to tap on unless you zoom in enough to make it relatively smaller.
Note that the simulation of corrected font sizing fails on some pages in the website. This is due to a need to change the font sizing that is set in the existing style sheets. The prototype attempts to override those settings, but that is for demonstration purposes only. __________
